preqs: ECF1200 and ECB2731 or ECF2731 or ECF2931

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECB3121, ECC3690, ECS3121, ECW3121}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB2731, ECF2731, ECF2931} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECB3121, ECC3690, ECS3121, ECW3121}

(Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECF1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} AND  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB2731, ECF2731, ECF2931} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECB3121, ECC3690, ECS3121, ECW3121}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECB2331, ECF2731, ECF2931} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: The pure theory of international trade. Trade and income distribution, economic growth and changes in trade, bases for trade and gains from trade. Trade policy. Tariffs, quotas, subsidies, import discrimination and other national policies affecting trade. Trade policies in developing nations. The foreign exchange market and its impact on international trade. Models of currency crisis.
